name: Colour Game (memascoli)
description:
Hi guys! This is just a Test! I'm testing this game engine tool called "flickgame". I made this little simple game in order to understand better how the tool works...

In the future i will create a more complex games using it, although the tool itself has a lot of restrictions and it's very simple.

And for sure those games will be focused in storytelling rather than gameplay... But i will try to be more inventive and creative with this tool.
